name: Maze Road
description:
"Maze Road" will take you into another time-space. In the magical world, you will experience a perfect journey with beautiful and clean images, mysterious and amazing rules, ethereal and wonderful music.

Please come with me to have a mystery journey! You need to open your mind and use your wisdom to pass the traps. You will encounter all kinds of unpredictable mysterious traps, some of which even result in the change of natural rules...

Come on! Join to the amazing adventure.
